values:
SITTING.
THINKING.
FEELING...
HURT... ALONE... AND LIKE NO ONE WANTS YOU.
SEE A BOTTLE.
TAKE THE CAP OFF.
PUT IT TO YOUR NOSE.
TAKE A DEEP BREATH... THEN EXHALE.
REPEAT.
CAN'T STOP.
WON'T STOP.
MUST KILL ALL THE MEMORIES... GOOD/BAD.
YOUR HEAD STARTS TO HURT.
>YOU FEEL DIZZY.
SICK.
PUT THE CAP BACK ON.
WATCH THE WORLD SPIN AWAY.
CLOSE YOUR EYES.
PASS OUT.
WAKE UP THE NEXT DAY TO DO IT ALL OVER AGAIN... FOR ABOUT SIX YEARS OF YOUR LIFE... AND YOUR TURNING 18 IN 18 DAYS.


THIS IS A POEM ABOUT ABUSING INHALANT DRUGS

I LOST MY FISH!!! :( I THOUGHT HE LIKED ME BUT I GUESS CONFUSED BY HIS EMOTIONAL SITUATION HE MIGHT HAVE JUST BEEN LOOKING FOR SOMEONE TO COMFORT HIM BUT I DON'T KNOW AND WHEN I TRIED TO TALK TO HIM HE LOOKED AT ME LIKE HE WAS LOST. HE WAS SO SLEEP DEPRIVED THAT HE DIDN'T REMEMBER ANYTHING!!!!!!!!!!

If there is someone out there for everyone in the world, why does it feel like I can't find anyone to call my own??? If someone has a girlfriend that doesn't live by him and you are in "love" with him and they make you feel so happy every time you see him and he flirts with you why can't he just give you a chance and go out with you??? My heart is broken because my love loves another. every single person in my school thinks that we are going out by he has some one else. So I am left behind picking up the broken pieces of my heart waiting in the shadows till he realizes that I'm there for him.
